text: Bhogaon is a town and a nagar panchayat in Mainpuri district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bhogaon had a population of 26,799. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bhogaon has an average literacy rate of 55%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 61% and female literacy of 47%. 17% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Mainpuri district
title: Bhogaon
